pullRequest.title: [daikin] Add Energy, compressor frequency and special mode channels
pullRequest.bodyText:
#6980: Add compressor frequency channel
#6115: Add energy current year channels
Add special modes - Powerful channel
Signed-off-by: Lukas Agethen lukas83@gmx.de

commit.message:
[daikin] Add Energy, compressor frequency and special mode channels

#6980: Add compressor frequency channel
#6115: Add energy current year channels

Signed-off-by: Lukas Agethen <lukas83@gmx.de>

nodes.bodyText: The first letter of every word in a label should be capitalized.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -147,6 +173,172 @@
 			</options>
 		</state>
 	</channel-type>
+	
+	<channel-type id="acunit-cmpfrequency" advanced="true">
+		<item-type>Number</item-type>
+		<label>Compressor Frequency</label>
+		<description>Current compressor frequency</description>
+		<state readOnly="true" pattern="%.0f%%"></state>
+	</channel-type>
+	<channel-type id="acunit-specialmode" advanced="true">
+		<item-type>String</item-type>
+		<label>Special mode</label>

@@ -147,6 +173,172 @@
 			</options>
 		</state>
 	</channel-type>
+	
+	<channel-type id="acunit-cmpfrequency" advanced="true">
+		<item-type>Number</item-type>
+		<label>Compressor Frequency</label>
+		<description>Current compressor frequency</description>
+		<state readOnly="true" pattern="%.0f%%"></state>
+	</channel-type>
+	<channel-type id="acunit-specialmode" advanced="true">
+		<item-type>String</item-type>
+		<label>Special mode</label>
+		<description>Current special mode</description>
+		<state readOnly="true" pattern="%s"></state>
+	</channel-type>
+	<channel-type id="acunit-specialmode-powerful" advanced="true">
+		<item-type>Switch</item-type>
+		<label>Powerful mode</label>

nodes.bodyText: Perhaps you should make two channel groups; one for energyheating and another for energycooling.

nodes.bodyText:
I don't know why you are passing in the decimal type into the quantity type. I'm pretty sure you don't need to do that.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    updateState(channel, maybeTemperature.<State>map(t -> new QuantityType<>(new DecimalType(t), SIUnits.CELSIUS))
          
          
            
                    updateState(channel, maybeTemperature.<State>map(t -> new QuantityType<>(t, SIUnits.CELSIUS))

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                            t -> new QuantityType<>(new DecimalType(BigDecimal.valueOf(t[i - 1].longValue(), 1)),
          
          
            
                                            t -> new QuantityType<>(BigDecimal.valueOf(t[i - 1].longValue(), 1),
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -160,6 +216,35 @@ protected void changeFanDir(String fanDir) throws DaikinCommunicationException {
         webTargets.setControlInfo(info);
     }
 
+    /**
+     *
+     * @param powerfulMode
+     * @return Is change successful
+     * @throws DaikinCommunicationException
+     */
+    protected boolean changeSpecialModePowerful(boolean powerfulMode) throws DaikinCommunicationException {
+
+        return webTargets.setSpecialMode(SpecialModeKind.POWERFUL, powerfulMode);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Updates energy year channels. Values are provided in hundreds of Watt
+     *
+     * @param channelPrefix
+     * @param maybePower
+     */
+    protected void updateEnergyYearChannel(String channelPrefix, Optional<Integer[]> maybePower) {
+        IntStream.range(1, 13).forEach(
+                i -> updateState(String.format(DaikinBindingConstants.CHANNEL_ENERGY_STRING_FORMAT, channelPrefix, i),
+                        maybePower.<State>map(
+                                t -> new QuantityType<>(new DecimalType(BigDecimal.valueOf(t[i - 1].longValue(), 1)),

nodes.bodyText:
Please use units where possible.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		<item-type>Number</item-type>
          
          
            
            		<item-type>Number:Frequency</item-type>
          
      
    
    
  

You will also need to update your code accordingly to use QuantityType for this channel instead.

humidity should use QuantityType with SmartHomeUnits.PERCENT units.
Note: Changing this might be outside the scope of this PR so you are free to skip this change.
Please specify specific exceptions if possible. What do you expect to be thrown here anyway?
You are displaying the frequency as a percentage?

+		<label>Compressor Frequency</label>
+		<description>Current compressor frequency</description>
+		<state readOnly="true" pattern="%.0f%%"></state>

nodes.bodyText: Please add yourself to the author tags for this file.

commit.message:
Update small typos and code refactoring as suggested by cpmeister

Signed-off-by: Lukas Agethen <lukas83@gmx.de>

Update small typos and added units where possible



Signed-off-by: Lukas Agethen <lukas83@gmx.de>
